title: 3MCT: Phone Apps
description: It’s time for another bracket…this week phone apps. Here’s a shocker, things get crazy immediately, don’t blame Katie. But first the crew tries to decide what letter they would eat if they had to. Plus, Christina’s boyfriend is smelly. And to end the podcast…we have Millennials vs. Gen Z and you already know Travis has a crazy take
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: This week bracket is on phone apps
